alert.note: Alert for Inland Lee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:11PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Lee County through 600 PM EDT... At 511 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cape Coral to near Iona to near Bonita Springs. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, Fort Myers, Bonita Springs, Matlacha, Palmona Park, Harlem Heights, Lochmoor Waterway Estates, Iona, Cypress Lake, Pine Island Center, McGregor, Pine Manor, Lovers Key State Park, Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores, Pineland, St. James City, Villas, Saint James City, Punta Rassa and Fort Myers Villas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
